snippet: Reaction on Monday to an ultimatum from Egypt’s army, giving President Mohamed Morsi 48 hours to resolve a political crisis, was swift, both online and on the streets.
abstract: Reaction on Monday to an ultimatum from Egypt’s army, giving President Mohamed Morsi 48 hours to resolve a political crisis, was swift, both online and on the streets.
